description:
With my Unofficial The Sims FreePlay Game Guide you will learn exactly what you need to know in order to become an expert player and get unlimited money!

My Guide Covers the Following:

- How to Download for Free.
- Overview & Basic Information
- How to Play the Game.
- Character Overview.
- Get Unlimited Money & LP!
- Sims Moods & Stats.
- Professional Tips & Strategies.
- Achievements Overview.
- Secrets, Tips, and Tricks Used By Pro Players!
- Detailed Step by Step Instructions!
- PLUS MUCH MORE!

Purchase now and never run out of money again! Become an Expert Player Today!

Disclaimer:
This product is not associated, affiliated, endorsed, or sponsored by EA Games, nor have they been reviewed, tested or certified by EA Games. This guide is to be used as a reference. This does not modify or alter the game in any way. This is a written guide and not a software program.
